### Summary

#### H-index: **18**


```{r, fig.height=4, fig.width=2, echo = FALSE}
#citation report from ISI Web of Knowledge 2019-10-11
tribble(~ year,  ~ citations,
        2019,    216,
        2018,    304,
        2017,    332,
        2016,    243,
        2015,    220,
        2014,    134,
        2013,     71,
        2012,     45
        ) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = citations)) +
  geom_col(fill = "goldenrod1") +
  geom_text(aes(label = citations), hjust = 1.1, size = 5) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 2012:2019) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0, 0), position = "bottom") +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_classic(14) +
  theme(axis.line.y = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
        plot.background = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major.x = element_line(linetype = "dashed", colour = "grey60")) +
  ggimage::theme_transparent() +
  labs(x = NULL,
       y = "citations",
       caption = "data from ISI Web of Knowledge") -> citation_plot
ggsave(citation_plot, file = "citation.png", width = 3, height = 7, bg = "transparent")
```
